issue.title: Give parameters into included models in a SDF

content.raw:
Hi,

Thanks, it works well for the platform, so I get rid of the <plugin> in the platform model and then I include this model and add the plugin after the </include> tag.

It's not possible though, to do it with the laser plugin (and I suppose any sensor) since the <plugin> needs to be inside <sensor> and this inside <model> as the following error suggests:

```
#!bash

Error [parser.cc:697] XML Element[sensor], child of element[model] not defined in SDF. Ignoring.[model]
```
I suppose to solve this a change in the SDF <include> would be required..
content.html:
Hi,

Thanks, it works well for the platform, so I get rid of the <plugin> in the platform model and then I include this model and add the plugin after the </include> tag.

It's not possible though, to do it with the laser plugin (and I suppose any sensor) since the <plugin> needs to be inside <sensor> and this inside <model> as the following error suggests:

Error [parser.cc:697] XML Element[sensor], child of element[model] not defined in SDF. Ignoring.[model]

I suppose to solve this a change in the SDF <include> would be required..
